name: Miss Santa
skill: Restores 1347/1607 HP to all allies. Targets deal 15/17% more DMG for a limited time.
ability: Sharply reduces all foes' crit DMG at the start of each wave.
bond: Increases Miss Santa's skill DMG by 5%

additional_data.description: A spirit who was mistaken for Santa Claus, the hero of Christmas. She just happened to be passing by and wearing a red suit when she was mistaken for the jolly old elf himself. While helping out with cases at the Bureau of the Occult, she has started training to become the real Santa Claus. While her methods may be questionable, nobody can doubt the sincerity of her determination. Maybe she really will become the real Santa someday soon.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Get a First Half or Second Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "Shadow over Christmas" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 5000 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Moderately increases the drop rate of Tiny Present during the "Shadow over Christmas" event.

main: "Someday I'm gonna be the real Santa!"
skill: "This is the best present I can give right now!"
summon: "Please let me train to become Santa Claus!"
limit_break: "I'm going to work hard—for the sake of the children!"
